translation.en: Dog? Where's the dog? [girl] Over there.
What kind of dog was it?
Yeah. What, did you miss it?
Hey, sweetie. Don't pick at your scab. Come on.
translation.es: Cariño, no te rasques la costra. Por favor.

translation.en: I was just checking. Did you make that hole?
translation.es: - Solo la revisaba. - ¿Tú hiciste ese agujero?

translation.en: I wouldn't even have a scab if Lily Stevens didn't push me.
translation.es: Ni siquiera tendría una costra si Lily Stevens no me hubiera empujado.

translation.en: Lily Stevens wouldn't have pushed you if you hadn't thrown chalk at her.
translation.es: Lily Stevens no te habría empujado si no le hubieras lanzado tiza.

translation.en: She was making faces at me.

translation.es: No debes lastimar a la gente.

translation.en: Not ever. She deserved to be hurt.
Clara, no one deserves to be hurt, no one.
translation.es: Clara, nadie merece ser lastimado. Nadie.

translation.en: [radio host] I got to meet TJ. He's a nice, nice gentleman.
translation.es: Pude conocer a TJ. Es un caballero encantador. Por favor, vayan a TJ's y prueben los wafles.

translation.en: Please go in to TJ's and get yourselves some waffles there.
translation.es: Es un caballero encantador. Por favor, vayan a TJ's y prueben los wafles.

translation.en: So that is on the list, and I'm gonna put it down as number two
translation.es: Bien, la pondré en el número dos de la lista.

translation.en: [Tony Robbins on podcast] We grow or we die.
So, we're unaware that we use events as a trigger
translation.es: No nos damos cuenta de que hay eventos que nos motivan a volver

translation.en: to get home back to the patterns we know
translation.es: No nos damos cuenta de que hay eventos que nos motivan a volver a los patrones que conocemos, por incómodos que sean.
a los patrones que conocemos, por incómodos que sean.

translation.en: So, if you identify where you live,
emotionally, the patterns that are limiting you,
translation.es: dónde te limitan emocionalmente esos patrones,

translation.en: -the second piece is find the antidote. -[phone dings]
translation.es: - lo segundo es encontrar el antídoto. - Mierda.
- lo segundo es encontrar el antídoto. - Mierda. Todos enfrentaremos...

translation.en: multiple times in our life, extreme stress.
translation.es: ACCIDENTE A 1 KM RETRASO DE UNA HORA

translation.en: The difference in peoples' lives is not what we face,
translation.es: La diferencia no está en lo que enfrentamos,

translation.en: it's what we do with what we face.
Life gives us these events, these, quote, "horrific events,"
translation.es: La vida nos da estos eventos, "eventos horribles",

translation.en: because there's an area of our life that has to grow.
translation.es: porque hay un área de nuestra vida que necesita crecer.

translation.en: You can take yourself from a place
translation.es: Es posible salir de un lugar

translation.en: where in the face of absolute total tragedy,
translation.es: donde te encuentres frente a una tragedia absoluta...

translation.en: [woman] You know, Poppy taught me how to change a tire.
translation.es: Sabes, Poppy me enseñó a cambiar un neumático.
Un día yo te enseñaré a ti.

translation.en: In the meantime, you should probably come over here and...
get a head start and pay attention.
Maybe you can help by getting Mommy her coffee.
translation.es: Tal vez me puedas pasar el café.

translation.en: [Clara] When we get to Oklahoma, can we...
Oh, God. Okay. It's okay, sweetie.

translation.es: Vamos, está bien. ¿Clara? ¡Clara! Por favor, cielo.

translation.en: Come on, stay with me, baby, okay?
Just stay with me, baby. Stay with me.
Oh, God. Come on, come on.
I'm so sorry for barging in.
My little girl, she got bitten by a snake,
translation.es: Una serpiente mordió a mi hija.

translation.en: and I really need your help.
I got a flat tire, and I can't get a signal.
translation.es: Mi neumático se pinchó y no tengo señal telefónica.

translation.en: She's really burning up. I don't know what to do.
translation.es: Está ardiendo de fiebre. No sé qué hacer.

translation.en: I've worked on many a bite out here. Let me help her.
translation.es: He tratado muchas mordidas. Déjame ayudarla.

translation.en: -Oh, she's going blue. She's going blue! -Here, let me.
translation.es: - Se está poniendo azul. - Déjame ayudar. ¡Está azul! ¡Por favor, ayúdela!

translation.en: What can you do? The nearest town's Tulia.
translation.es: - ¿Qué puede hacer? - El pueblo más cercano es Tulia.

translation.en: You best get that tire sorted out.
translation.es: Será mejor que arregles esa llanta.

translation.en: Come on, don't just stand there, honey. Time's a-wasting.
translation.es: Vamos, no te quedes ahí parada. No hay tiempo que perder.

translation.en: [man] We'll keep her in for the day, monitor her condition,
translation.es: La dejaremos aquí un día para monitorearla.

translation.en: but trust me, if a five-year-old was bitten by a rattlesnake...
translation.es: Pero, créame, si una cascabel mordiera a una niña de cinco años,

translation.en: From the looks, it's just exhaustion, mild dehydration.
translation.es: Por su aspecto, solo está agotada y algo deshidratada.

translation.en: You should've seen her. She was burning up, she wasn't breathing.
translation.es: Debió haberla visto. Estaba ardiendo, no respiraba.

translation.en: She turned blue, for Christ sakes.
translation.es: Se puso azul, por el amor de Dios.

translation.en: [doctor] Were you feeling out of sorts at all during the drive?
translation.es: ¿Sintió usted algún malestar durante el viaje?

translation.en: -[doctor] Medication? You taking anything? -[woman] Nothing, no.
Listen, Phoenix to Oklahoma can be a long haul.
translation.es: Conducir de Phoenix a Oklahoma puede ser duro.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm not a very good flier, so driving was the lesser of two evils.
translation.es: Bueno, no soy buena con los aviones. Conducir era el menor de dos males.

translation.en: We're starting over, and the move's been a lot on Clara.
translation.es: Empezaremos una nueva vida. Y la mudanza no ha sido fácil para Clara.

translation.en: [doctor] Slightly elevated. Not surprising, but nothing alarming.
translation.es: La tensión está un poco alta. Era de esperarse, pero no es nada alarmante.

translation.en: Look, I know this sounds crazy.
But there has to be some kind of explanation.
I mean, that old woman, maybe she had...
translation.es: Digo, esa señora tal vez tenía...

translation.en: I don't know, like an ancient remedy on her shelf or something.
translation.es: ...no sé, un remedio antiguo o algo así.

translation.en: I'm just... I'm just telling you what happened.
translation.es: Solo le cuento lo que ocurrió.

translation.en: [doctor] Your daughter's gonna be fine. She just needs to rest.
translation.es: Su hija estará bien. Solo necesita descansar.

translation.en: You need to do the same.
[man] That's all it is. God's will.
translation.es: Eso es todo. Es la voluntad de Dios.

translation.en: To think we almost lost her.
You really are lucky. Things could have ended much differently.
translation.es: Es usted afortunada. Las cosas podrían salido muy mal.

translation.en: I'm here to talk about your payment, Ms. Ridgeway.
translation.es: Vine a hablar de su pago, señora Ridgeway.

translation.en: Why don't you pull up a chair?
So, we have insurance, my daughter and I, both.
translation.es: Tenemos seguro. Tanto mi hija como yo...

translation.en: Oh, I'm not talking about your hospital debt.
translation.es: No me refiero a su deuda con el hospital.

translation.en: I'm talking about the other debt.
translation.es: Me refiero a la otra deuda.

translation.en: What was done for your daughter doesn't come cheap.
translation.es: Lo que hicieron por su hija no es barato.

translation.en: And now you owe one in return.
translation.es: Y ahora debe un alma a cambio.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I thought you said soul.
Ms. Ridgeway, you don't have long to pay your debt.
translation.es: Señora Ridgeway, tiene poco tiempo para pagar su deuda.

translation.en: You only have until sunset, which is...
translation.es: Solo tiene hasta el anochecer, que será...

translation.en: The soul you take can be any one of your choosing,
translation.es: Puede tomar cualquier alma que elija.

translation.en: And it must be paid in full and on time.
translation.es: Y debe ser pagada en su totalidad y a tiempo.

translation.en: don't really understand what's going on.
I don't know who you are. I think I'm gonna call security.
translation.es: No sé quién es usted. Voy a llamar a Seguridad.

translation.en: I would like you to leave the room, leave my daughter alone.
translation.es: Quiero que salga de aquí y deje a mi hija en paz.

translation.en: Failure to meet your debt, Ms. Ridgeway,
translation.es: Si no paga su deuda, señora Ridgeway,

translation.en: will result in your daughter's condition returning to what it was.
translation.es: su hija volverá al estado en que se encontraba.

translation.en: I'd like you to leave now.
Let me, uh, remind you of what that'd look like.
...before she succumbs to the snake venom...
translation.es: ...antes de sucumbir al veneno de la serpiente...

translation.en: working its way through her tiny body.
She will die, Ms. Ridgeway, that I can assure you.
translation.es: Ella morirá, señora Ridgeway, se lo aseguro.

translation.en: Make it stop! Fucking get out of here! Get out!
Help! Someone come in here, now! Please, somebody help me!
You best get a move on.
Okay, I need you to call-- -[female nurse] Did something happen here? -[alarm stops]
-Who do you want us to call? -Miss?
-[male nurse] Should I call security? -No, no, no, no! No, don't.
translation.es: ¿Llamo a Seguridad? ¡No! No lo hagas. No será necesario.
¡No! No lo hagas. No será necesario.

translation.en: [woman] I've been up since before dawn, driving.
translation.es: Estoy despierta desde antes del amanecer, conduciendo.

translation.en: Maybe I need to check into the motel across the road.
translation.es: Tal vez deba ir al motel de enfrente.

translation.en: [female nurse] That's probably for the best. We'll keep an eye on her for you.
translation.es: Quizá sea lo mejor. Nosotros cuidaremos a su hija.

translation.en: [woman] Okay, I'll just say goodbye to her.
[cries] I don't know what's going on, Clara.
translation.es: No sé qué está pasando, Clara.

translation.en: I just want you to be okay.
I'm fine, I don't need any help!
Only one way to save her! Stay away from me.
translation.es: - ¡Solo hay una salida! - No se me acerque.

translation.en: [news reporter] This is the diner in Tulia, Texas
translation.es: En esta cafetería de Tulia, Texas,

translation.en: where 47-year-old lawyer Donald Covington was fatally stabbed in the chest
translation.es: el abogado Donald Covington, de 47 años, fue asesinado a puñaladas

translation.en: by 32-year-old school teacher Michael James Warner just before sunset.
translation.es: por un maestro de 32 años, Michael James Warner, justo antes del anochecer.

translation.en: Witnesses say Warner kept repeating, in a bizarre manner,
translation.es: Los testigos afirman que Warner repetía de forma extraña

translation.en: "A soul for a soul," as he attacked Covington.
translation.es: "un alma por un alma" al atacar a Covington.

translation.en: [Katrina] "The difference is not what we face,
translation.es: La diferencia no está en lo que enfrentamos.

translation.en: it's what we choose to do when we face it."
"The difference is not what we face,
translation.es: La diferencia no está en lo que enfrentamos.

translation.en: it's what we choose to do when we face it."
That... that was so nosy of me.
I shouldn't have just been peering into your room like that.
translation.es: No debí haber escudriñado tu habitación.

translation.en: No, I just wanted to offer my condolences.
translation.es: No, solo quería darte mis condolencias.

translation.en: Oh, no. Uh... Of course not.
Such a... [clears throat] Such a strange thing...
waiting for your daddy to die.
translation.es: Esperar a que muera tu papá.

translation.en: Anyway, I'm sorry. What brings you here?
translation.es: En fin, lo siento. ¿Por qué estás aquí?

translation.en: We've been driving all day, and... she's not feeling too well.
translation.es: Llevamos todo el día conduciendo y no se siente muy bien.

translation.en: [woman] How's she doing? She's fine. Um...
Doctor thinks she just needs some rest.
translation.es: El doctor cree que solo necesita descansar.

translation.en: Anyway, um, it was nice chatting with you.
translation.es: Bueno, fue un placer charlar contigo.

translation.en: I hope you and your little one get out of here soon.
translation.es: Espero que tú y tu pequeña salgan de aquí pronto.

translation.en: Well, uh, actually she's out for the count right now
translation.es: De hecho, ahora mismo está durmiendo.

translation.en: and I am going stir-crazy in that silence all by myself.
translation.es: Y me estoy volviendo loca ahí sola, entre tanto silencio.

translation.en: So I was wondering if maybe, uh, I could...
The nurse described it kind of like a...
Or was it a one-way mirror?
Either way, he won't be waking up.
He seems to be at peace.
B-7. No, it's at the, um...
All right, just wait there, I'm coming.
Leave it to my sister to get lost in a hospital this small.
translation.es: Solo mi hermana puede perderse en un hospital tan pequeño.
Debería ir a ver a Clara.

translation.en: [whispers] I have to do this, I have to do this.
I was just using the, um, bathroom.
-Wh... What the hell happened? -Stay away from me.
Hey, you don't... You don't look all right.
Look, you want me to call someone?
What, you gonna put this down to another roller derby injury, huh?
translation.es: Volverás a decir que te lastimaste patinando, ¿no?

translation.en: It's a heck of a sport you chose there. Just give me a beer, Francine.
translation.es: - Vaya deporte el que elegiste. - Dame una cerveza, Francine.

translation.en: is doing the same thing and expecting a different result.
translation.es: ...es hacer lo mismo una y otra vez, esperando un resultado diferente.

translation.en: Let me stay, please, just a little while.
translation.es: Por favor, solo un rato más.

translation.en: Get up off that stool, Abbie. [Francine] Billy, just let her finish her damn beer.
translation.es: - Levántate, Abbie. - Billy, déjala terminar su cerveza.

translation.en: This don't concern you, Francine, unless, of course, you want it to.
translation.es: No es asunto tuyo, Francine. A menos que eso quieras, claro.

translation.en: [Francine] Can't have y'all getting into it here.
Apologize to Francine for coming in here and making a scene,
translation.es: Pídele disculpas a Francine por entrar aquí y hacer una escena,

translation.en: Just get out of here, both of y'all.
Place has gone to shit anyways.
translation.es: Da igual, este lugar se cae a pedazos.
Sí. La flor y nata de Tulia.

translation.en: Only a matter of time before she ends up in the obituaries.
translation.es: Tarde o temprano, ella terminará en los obituarios.

translation.en: Some people are just beyond help.
translation.es: Hay personas a las que es imposible ayudar.

translation.en: [Billy] Why you always gotta make a scene?
translation.es: ¿Por qué siempre tienes que hacer una escena?

translation.en: Get in the truck! I'm not standing here in the goddamn street!
translation.es: Súbete. ¡No te quedarás en la maldita calle!

translation.en: [man] Well, go on. It ain't gonna bite you.
Shoots a maximum of 16 rounds through a flush-fitted magazine.
translation.es: Dispara un máximo de 16 balas por cargador.

translation.en: I'll do you two boxes for the price of one.
translation.es: Te daré dos cajas por el precio de una.

translation.en: You ever, uh, fire one of those, darlin'? I'll take it.
translation.es: - ¿Has disparado una de estas? - Me la llevo.

translation.en: I'm just gonna need to see your license. You're a Texas resident, I take it.
translation.es: Necesito tu licencia. Eres residente de Texas, supongo.

translation.en: Well, I'm afraid I can't be letting you purchase a firearm.
translation.es: Bueno... Me temo que no podré venderte un arma.

translation.en: my daughter and I, we were, uh...
I feel like I need protection.
translation.es: Siento que necesito protección. No sé qué podamos hacer,

translation.en: And I don't know what you can do, but maybe you could just...
translation.es: Siento que necesito protección. No sé qué podamos hacer, tal vez usted podría hacer la vista gorda, o...

translation.en: just turn a blind eye, or... I don't...
translation.es: tal vez usted podría hacer la vista gorda, o...

translation.en: When did it get to be like this?
When did the open roads of this great country of ours
translation.es: ¿Cuándo cayeron los caminos de este gran país
¿Cuándo cayeron los caminos de este gran país a semejante grado de salvajismo?

translation.en: It's not right, not one bit.
translation.es: Eso no está bien, en absoluto.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I can't help you, but...
translation.es: Lo siento. Yo no puedo ayudarte...

translation.en: His name's Charlie. Lives here in Tulia.
translation.es: Se llama Charlie, vive en Tulia.

translation.en: I guess you'd call him a private dealer.
translation.es: Es lo que llamarías un "distribuidor privado".

translation.en: He said he'd vouch for me. Are you Charlie?
translation.es: Dijo que respondería por mí. ¿Eres Charlie?

translation.en: I'm gonna have to do a quick body check.
translation.es: Tendré que hacer un un cacheo rápido.

translation.en: -You want me to fix you up some tea? -No, thank you.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres una taza de té? - No, gracias.

translation.en: More of a coffee drinker, huh?
My wife, Tracy, she'd stock the cupboard
translation.es: Mi esposa, Tracy, llenaba la alacena

translation.en: full of a whole variety of exotic flavors.
translation.es: con sabores exóticos de todo tipo.

translation.en: -So, can we-- -You sure you don't wanna try some?
translation.es: - ¿Podemos...? - ¿Segura de que no quieres un poco?

translation.en: Tracy is no longer with us.
translation.es: Tracy ya no está con nosotros.

translation.en: She took the barrel of a Glock, identical to the one that you're buying...
translation.es: Agarró el cañón de una Glock, idéntica a la que vas a comprar...

translation.en: and put it in her mouth.
so sorry to hear about your wife, but I've gotta get going.
translation.es: ...lo de su esposa, pero debo irme.

translation.en: I mean, I can rustle up the other ten, but I've gotta go.
translation.es: Puedo conseguir los diez que faltan, pero debo irme.

translation.en: [sighs] I ain't gonna deprive a woman of carrying a piece.
translation.es: No privaré a una mujer de tener un arma.

translation.en: Now, what kind of a man would I be?
You ever handle one of them before?
Who's the unlucky son of a bitch?
You out to end someone. I can see it in your eyes, plain as day.
translation.es: Vas a matar a alguien, lo veo claramente en tus ojos.

translation.en: [man over video] Hi, it's me again, Mr. Glock.
translation.es: Hola, soy yo otra vez. El señor Glock.

translation.en: Uh, I thought today, uh, one of the Glocks I've not demonstrated
translation.es: Hoy traje una de las Glock que no les había mostrado,

translation.en: or talked about, is the good old reliable Glock 19.
It's a magazine full of bullets in it,
translation.es: Pueden ver que el cargador está lleno de balas.

translation.en: and it also has one in the chamber.
translation.es: Y tenemos una bala en la cámara.

translation.en: Shit. The towels are all wet.
[Abbie] Oh, I put them in before work. They're in the drier.
translation.es: Iré a traer una toalla seca.

translation.en: [Billy] Can't have my girl drying off with no wet towel.
translation.es: No dejaré que mi chica se seque con una toalla mojada.
- Debo irme a las siete. - De acuerdo.

translation.en: You haven't finished your punishment yet.
translation.es: Aún no has terminado tu castigo.

translation.en: [Abbie] I'm not feeling so good. Maybe we can rain check?
translation.es: No me siento muy bien. ¿Podríamos aplazarlo?

translation.en: You already made a fool of me once today.
translation.es: Ya me pusiste en ridículo hoy.
- Sin orden, ¿qué somos? - De acuerdo. - Bien. - ¿Qué seríamos?

translation.en: You don't wanna be an animal.
Half-hour should do it. Come on.
The fuck you doing? Get your stupid ass back up there!
translation.es: ¿Qué rayos haces? ¡Vuelve a subir tu culo ahí!

translation.en: Okay. You stay there. Don't move, okay?
translation.es: Bien. Quédate ahí. No te muevas, ¿entendido?

translation.en: -If you want the truck-- -Just get up!
I want you to tell me...
how to get to the garage. Can we get to the garage from the house?
translation.es: ...cómo ir al garaje. ¿Podemos llegar sin salir de la casa?

translation.en: I want you to follow my directions.
Okay? You just listen to what I tell you.
Hey, uh, left at the T-junction.
translation.es: Gira a la izquierda en el cruce.

translation.en: -Where are we going? -Just make a left.
Toss the keys back here slowly.
Just tell me what you want.
I can get you anything you want. Please, just tell me.
translation.es: Te conseguiré lo que sea. Por favor, dime.

translation.en: No. 'Cause if I do, you'll shoot me.
translation.es: No. Si lo hago, me dispararás.

translation.en: I'm not asking you, I'm telling you. Get out of the truck.
translation.es: No es una pregunta, es una orden. Baja de la camioneta.

translation.en: [tearfully] Why are you gonna kill me?
Just tell me what I've done so I know, please.
translation.es: Dime qué hice, quiero saberlo, por favor.

translation.en: I can't help it because you're gonna kill me.
translation.es: No puedo evitarlo, vas a matarme.

translation.en: Look, I need you to hold yourself together
translation.es: - Por favor. - Necesito que te controles

translation.en: and get out of the fucking truck, okay? You hear me?
Please, because, look, I know I've done some fucked up things in this lifetime.
translation.es: Por favor, sé que he hecho cosas muy malas.

translation.en: But please, if you tell me, I can fix it, I promise.
translation.es: Pero, por favor, si me lo dices, prometo que lo enmendaré.

translation.en: Okay, listen to me, you piece of shit! I just want your fucking truck.
translation.es: Escúchame, basura. Solo quiero tu puta camioneta.

translation.en: [yells] Where are you, you piece of sh...
you gave it your best shot, Kat.
Stay there. That's good. Hold that.
translation.es: Quédate ahí. Muy bien. Sostén eso.

translation.en: There has to be another way to put this right.
translation.es: Debe haber otra forma de arreglar esto.

translation.en: You know what you gotta do.
I want you to know that I love you so, so, so much...
translation.es: Quiero que sepas que te quiero muchísimo,

translation.en: from the bottom of my heart.
none of this is gonna makes sense because it doesn't make any sense.
translation.es: ...nada de esto tendrá sentido, no lo tiene.

translation.en: But I want you to know that I didn't want to leave you.
translation.es: Pero quiero que sepas que yo no quería dejarte.

translation.en: And I had to do... I had to do...
I had to do what I had to do to keep you safe.
translation.es: Tuve que hacer lo necesario para mantenerte a salvo.

translation.en: I want you to remember me.
And keep me close to your heart as best as you can.
translation.es: Y que me lleves tan cerca de tu corazón como puedas.

translation.en: And, uh, don't let me fade.
I love you so, so, so much, sweetie.
You're gonna burn in hell for this.
translation.es: Arderás en el infierno por esto.

translation.en: You're gonna fucking burn, you fucking bitch.
You're gonna burn in hell for this! You'll burn!
This is Dr. Hayes. I'm calling about your daughter Clara.
translation.es: Habla el doctor Hayes. Llamo por Clara, su hija.

translation.en: I've been trying you for around an hour now.
translation.es: Hace una hora que la estoy llamando.

translation.en: She's fine. She's up, ready to go. She's wondering where you are. [chuckles]
translation.es: Está bien. Está lista para irse. Pregunta dónde está usted.

translation.en: So am I, for that matter.
Tell her I'm on my way. I'll be there soon.
translation.es: Dígale que voy en camino. Llegaré pronto.

translation.en: Okay, will do. I'll make sure she gets something to eat.
translation.es: Bueno. Me aseguraré de que coma algo.

translation.en: [Clara] They gave me red jello and ice cream.
translation.es: Me dieron gelatina roja y helado.

translation.en: Ooh, they did, sweetie? Yeah, and spaghetti for dinner.
translation.es: - ¿De verdad, cariño? - Sí, y espaguetis para la cena.

translation.en: When are we leaving? Do I have to stay in here?
No, we don't. We're free to go now.

translation.es: Sí, tienes razón, mamá, debí llamarte enseguida.

translation.en: I should have called you right back, but I just didn't want to bother you.
translation.es: Sí, tienes razón, mamá, debí llamarte enseguida. No quería molestarte. Pero ya vamos en camino, sí.

translation.en: But we're hitting the road now, yeah.
translation.es: No quería molestarte. Pero ya vamos en camino, sí.

translation.en: No. Promise you, everything is all good.
translation.es: No. Te juro que todo está bien.

translation.en: [Clara] What letter are we up to?
What letter were we up to?
Where do you think he's going, Mommy?
[Clara] Your turn, Mommy. We're up to I.
translation.es: Es tu turno, mami. Sigamos con la "I".
